skillTree.name: Rotting Promethean
skillTree.description: The unnatural speed and brutality of a reanimated Promethean makes it the ideal mount for any Undead, battle-mongering pirate.

skillTree.name: Lucky Charm
skillTree.description: "It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

skillTree.name: Forger
skillTree.description: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."

effects.description:
Income from all enemy buildings: -10%
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.name: Smuggler
skillTree.description: If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.

skillTree.name: Poacher
skillTree.description: The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Arsonist
skillTree.description: Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monkey Jacket
skillTree.description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"

skillTree.name: Swashbuckler
skillTree.description: If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike hard, strike true.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Taunt
skillTree.description: There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.

skillTree.name: Always Ready
skillTree.description: Death is always just a shot away.

skillTree.name: Blacker Powder
skillTree.description: "It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."

skillTree.name: Powder Monkey
skillTree.description: "Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"

skillTree.name: Blunderbuss
skillTree.description: "The recoil's a nightmare, but you can't deny the end result!"

skillTree.name: Gunsight
skillTree.description: A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.

skillTree.name: Pyromaniac
skillTree.description: Some beings just want to see the world burn.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Fires 6 projectiles each dealing 0 0 damage and 30 20 explosion damage (8m)

skillTree.name: Spiteful Shot
skillTree.description: Sheer, undiluted spite sharpens the dead eye further.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Spiteful Shot"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Spiteful Shot Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Spiteful Shot Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Kiss of the Deep
skillTree.description: No matter how far away, none can escape the Kiss of the Deep, nor breathe again with lungs full of seawater.

ui_effects.description: ➕100% chance to deal 20 direct damage to 2 entities per second

skillTree.name: Tidecall
skillTree.description: The tidal currents shall slow the foe's advance.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Tidecall Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Denizens of the Deep
skillTree.description: All manner of creatures infest the deep, many who have never - and should never - be seen above the waves.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Summons a unit of Rotting Prometheans

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Denizens of the Deep"

skillTree.name: Fog of the Damned
skillTree.description: As surely as night follows day, when the mist descends, death isn't far behind.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Fog of the Damned Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Fog of the Damned Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Fog of the Damned"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Fog of the Damned Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Fog of the Damned Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Kraken's Pull
skillTree.description: Once the mighty Kraken's tentacles take hold, only the toughest can fight their way free.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Kraken's Pull"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Kraken's Pull Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Kraken's Pull Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Vangheist’s Revenge
skillTree.description: No one sails this ship of fools.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Vangheist's Revenge"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Vangheist's Revenge Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Vangheist's Revenge Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Held Together by Screws
skillTree.description: Bone, muscle and sinew cannot always be relied upon to hold together unassisted.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Reanimated Marksman
skillTree.description: Death hasn't got in the way of this one's sure-shotted aim; in fact, if anything, he's got better.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units

	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob and Deck Gunners units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Black Powder Overload
skillTree.description: You can't have too much of a good thing and a bit of what you fancy does no harm.

Ammunition: +10% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units

Ammunition: +20% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Rotten Death
skillTree.description: It never ends well.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 5% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 5% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Haunting Horror
skillTree.description: What has been seen cannot be unseen.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Deck Droppers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Terrorgheist, Scurvy Dogs and Syreens units

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Drowned & Bound
skillTree.description: Like Unliving moths drawn inexorably towards a dazzling flame, the risen drowned strive - and stumble - to always be close to the one who has bound them.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Animated Hulks and Mournguls units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Avast Ye!
skillTree.description: "Listen very carefully, me hearties, I shall say this only once… Quiet! Stromfels' stinkin' breath!"

skillTree.name: Deadly March
skillTree.description: The once-men of the Undead legions march ever onwards, according to the will of their binder.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +18 for Zombie Pirate Deckhands Mob, Boarding Crew and Depth Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ensorcelled Weapons
skillTree.description: This is a dirty business, that much is certain, so why not get a little extra help to give yourself an edge?

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob, Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob, Deck Gunners, Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Masterly Splicing
skillTree.description: Their rope skills are really rather excellent, considering how long the entire crew have been dead.

Leadership: +8 for Deck Droppers, Scurvy Dogs, Terrorgheist, Animated Hulks, Mournguls and Syreens units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Deck Droppers, Scurvy Dogs, Terrorgheist, Animated Hulks, Mournguls and Syreens units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hardened by Death
skillTree.description: Surviving death tends to instil a certain toughness in one.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Rotting Prometheans, Rotting Leviathan and Necrofex Colossus units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: All Hands Hoay!
skillTree.description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Binded to Service
skillTree.description: They could not break free, even if they wanted to.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -3% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -8% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ghost Fleet
skillTree.description: Cursed to haunt the waves forever, never finding rest or solace.

skillTree.name: Freebooter
skillTree.description: If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.name: Sea Dogs
skillTree.description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +7 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +10 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Go on Account
skillTree.description: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Gambler's Wit
skillTree.description: Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.

skillTree.name: Coaming & Preservative
skillTree.description: Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.

skillTree.name: Black Flag
skillTree.description: Beware those who sail under the black flag - they give no quarter and never, ever give up the chase.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Legendary Status
backgroundSkills.description: People don't even speak in hushed tones anymore, such is this one's renown.
